wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Es fixeru sta kubértu pa lisénsa [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [[creativecommons:by-sa/3.0/|Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported]].
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: kupia, distribui i transmiti es óbra
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Bu ten ki ndika ken k'é otor, furnisi un ligason pa lisénsa, i minta si foi fetu algun alterason. Bu podi fase-l di kolker fórma razuávi, ma sin sujiri ki lisensiador ta apoia-bu o ta subiskrebi uzu ki bu ta fasi di es óbra.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-hea: kunpartidja na térmus di mésmu lisénsa
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Si bu mustura, transfurma o omenta es kuntiúdu, bu ten ki distribui bus kontributus ku [[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses|mésmu lisensa o un lisensa konpatívi]] ku kel orijinal.
